attributes.description:
Carpointe- At Tavcor George we believe in first class customer service. 
All our Vehicles undergo a 80 Point Mechanical Check, AA Roadworthy Test and is Accident free unless advertised as otherwise. 
We do accept trade-ins of all Makes and Models. 
We have dedicated Finance Managers that can arrange finance for you should you want to finance the vehicle. We also offer Value Added Products like Service and Warranty Plan Extensions. 
We deliver Nationwide and charge a delivery fee depending on the distance of delivery. 
Price advertised excludes: Dealer Service Fee of R4000, Lic /Reg of R781, Number plates of R400.

attributes.description:
1 owner vehicle with full service history, still has a balance of a factory warranty expiring in January 2023.

This vehicle has an amazing 7" touchscreen interface which displays vehicle settings, media and audio settings and is an overall exquisite finish to this stunning SUV.

Perfect for day 2 day commute as well as those long distance family holiday / road tripping journeys.

At Mekor Suzuki Kenilworth our Pre-owned vehicles undergo a stringent 81-point quality check in our world-class workshop before we consider reselling it. 
Extended mechanical warranties available on request.

Trade ins welcome
In-house finance available.
